title: Episode 177: Boycotting Starbucks and Buycotting Chick-fil-A
description: Boycotting Starbucks and "buycotting" Chick-fil-A ... plus a new study shows that religious kids are cruel, heartless jerks and we should all be atheists. This week on the podcast!
